name: api_bridge
description: Forwards HTTP requests to an external middleware API. Use this tool to fetch data, submit information, or interact with backend services. The middleware URL and authentication are configured via environment variables.

method.description: HTTP method to use for the request

endpoint.description: Relative API path (e.g., '/users', '/crops/123'). Will be appended to MIDDLEWARE_URL

body.description: Optional JSON body for POST, PUT, or PATCH requests

query_params.description: Optional query parameters to append to the URL
